data.title: World Species : Ziziphus mauritiana (Indian jujube; Chinese apple; Chinese date; Indian cherry; Indian plum; Malay
data.meta_description: Ziziphus mauritiana (Indian jujube; Chinese apple; Chinese date; Indian cherry; Indian plum; Malay-jujube; Bedara; Jujubier), Allergen Potential: Medium-High, Air Quality Improvement: None, Carbon Capture: Low, Leaf Type: Deciduous, Height: 24 feet (7.4 m), Hardiness Zone Minimum: USDA Zone: 6 Low Temperature: -10 F° (-23.3 C°) → 0 F° (-17.8  C°), Hardiness Zone Maximum: USDA Zone: 9 Low Temperature: 20 F° (-6.7 C°) → 30 F° (-1.1  C°), Lifespan: Perennial, Shade Percentage: 87 %, Specific Gravity: 0.618, Structure: Tree, Temperature Reduction: Low, Width: 21 feet (6.3 m), Wind Reduction: Low, Water Use: Moderate
